item.title: About
item.description: About Hello! I’m Pawel Lipowczan. Software Engineer, Developer and Architect from Poland, Ustron. I have rich experience in web, desktop and mobile development.

item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) Rozpoczęcie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[KNOWLEDGES/5 minute journal]] (10 min) Own work

item.title: Father
item.description: Father ![[PRIVATE/ATTACHMENTS/Pasted image 20220821212724.png]] I’m a father of two wonderful kids: Mateusz 2010 Emilia 2013
